title: ascii-art
description: Ascii-art is a program which consists in receiving a string as an argument and outputting the string in a graphic representation using ASCII. Time to write big.

title: tetris-optimizer
description: Develop a program that receives only one argument, a path to a text file which will contain a list of tetrominoes and assemble them in order to create the smallest square possible.

title: ascii-art-web
description: Ascii-art-web consists in creating and running a server, in which it will be possible to use a web GUI (graphical user interface) version of your last project, ascii-art.

title: groupie-tracker
description: Groupie Trackers consists on receiving a given API and manipulate the data contained in it, in order to create a site, displaying the information.

title: net-cat
description: This project consists on recreating the NetCat in a Server-Client Architecture that can run in a server mode on a specified port listening for incoming connections, and it can be used in client mode, trying to connect to a specified port and transmitting information to the server.

title: lem-in
description: This project is meant to make you code a digital version of an ant farm.

title: atm-management-system
description:
You will be provided with an ATM management system where users can do the following actions:
  • Login/Register
  • Create a new account
  • Check the details of existing accounts
  • Update information of existing accounts
  • Remove existing accounts
  • Check list of owned accounts
  • Make transactions

title: forum
description:
This project consists in creating a web forum that allows :
  • communication between users.
  • associating categories to posts.
  • liking and disliking posts and comments.
  • filtering posts.

title: make-your-game
description:
This project involves creating your own game without using canvas inspired by one of these:
  • Bomberman
  • Flipper/ Pinball
  • Space Invaders
  • Donkey Kong
  • Brick Breaker/ Arkanoid
  • Pac-Man
  • Super Mario
  • Tetris
  • Duck Hunt

title: real-time-forum
description: This project consist on remake your forum with javascript. You can only have 1 html page and you need to add a chat in real-time

title: mister-quizz
description: You will have to continue to build a quiz game website that is already in development.

title: netfix
description: In this project you will help create a website in which all of this and more will be possible. This website is still in the creation process, so not all features are available. You are going to implement some of the missing features

title: tirage
description: This project displays a random image contained in a folder. The user can also add is own image.
This project aims to learn addition in an educational and fun way.

title: found-number
description: This project aims to learn reflection in an educational and fun way.

title: school-records
description: This project aims to help nursery school teachers to prepare their school records digitally.

title: memory
description: This project aims to learn memory in an educational and fun way.

title: roue-tirage
description: This project contain a wheel that selects an image from 8 images.

title: Encryption
description: Encryption is a program for encrypting and decrypting an entire folder.

title: chat
description: In this project I have create a chat with a go server and a websocket connection
